text: Approval for The Eversense CGM System.  The device is indicated for continually measuring glucose levels in adults (18 years and older) with diabetes for up to 90 days. The system is intended to: 1) Provide real-time glucose readings; 2) Provide glucose trend information; and3)	Provide alerts for the detection and prediction of episodes of low blood glucose (hypoglycemia) and high blood glucose (hyperglycemia).The system is a prescription device. Historical data from the system can be interpreted to aid in providing therapy adjustments. These adjustments should be based on patterns seen over time. The system is indicated for use as an adjunctive device to complement, not replace, information obtained from standard home blood glucose monitoring devices.
